name: Barry Barman (Android)
description:
Barry Barman is an educational game about making mocktails. This game is a school project from DAE Howest Kortrijk.

It has been playtested at a CoderDojo project day at technopolis in Mechelen Belgium.

The game is only available in dutch.

Game made by:

  • Dumoulin Robin
  • Vindevogel Taho
  • Erlynn Lebrocquy
  • Vandenbossche Jens
  • Viane Nathan
